name: Caveman
body: Caveman is a micro web framework on Clack. - Documentation - Contributors - Code ## Welcome to Caveman! ```common-lisp @url GET "/hi" (defun say-hi (params) "Hello, World!") ``` ## Easy to Setup Install Quicklisp and execute the following code on your Lisp. ``` (ql:quickload :caveman) ``` ## Contribution If you found a bug, report it on GitHub Issues. Of course you can fork and send a pull request to me. Thank you for your contribution.
tagline: A micro web framework for Common Lisp based on Clack
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
